channel.title: Overdose Pking Remake!
channel.description:
Well, I am making this server because I used to play a server called Overdosed Pk. I liked the server a lot, but for whatever reason it shut down. I decided to create the closest imitation of that source I could, while adding many extra updates to make it even better.
Features: -100% new dragon claw animations -New models for many monsters and weapons -Added sounds when in combat -Added NPC block emotes -Dueling with staking works 100% -3 most items kept on death interface *adds another item if you have protection prayer on* -Equipment interface works -New god sword stances work -Spirit shields with effects work -100% 474 bow animations work -Added crystal bow with projectile -Crystal bow doesn't need arrows -Added working cannon -Donator symbol works -Donator rank when yelling -Donator zone with a shop -Smithing now works 100% -Teleblock now works perfectly *can't logout to cancel it* -Teleother now works perfectly -Teleport Tablets now work perfectly with proper emotes, animations and GFX -All PvP armors with perfect ints added -Barrelchest anchor is 100% -Void has proper bonuses when complete set is on -EVERY knife now works properly -Every god sword has proper GFX and effect -Sara Sword now has perfect GFX -General Graardor is 100% animated -New assault interfaces work -New Pest control interfaces work -New hitmarks added -100% vengeance with animations -100% vengeance other with animations -Barrows works properly with digging in tunnels -EXP Lock and Unlocks added -Crafting works with tanning and gem crafting -New special bar with percent (%) of special left -New HP bars -New Textures added to client -All combat following works

item.title: Overdose Pking Remake!
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

Well, I am making this server because I used to play a server called Overdosed Pk. I liked the server a lot, but for whatever reason it shut down. I decided to create the closest imitation of that source I could, while adding many extra updates to make it even better.

Features:
-100% new dragon claw animations
-New models for many monsters and weapons
-Added sounds when in combat
-Added NPC block emotes
-Dueling with staking works 100%
-3 most items kept on death interface adds another item if you have protection prayer on
-Equipment interface works
-New god sword stances work
-Spirit shields with effects work
-100% 474 bow animations work
-Added crystal bow with projectile
-Crystal bow doesn’t need arrows
-Added working cannon
-Donator symbol works
-Donator rank when yelling
-Donator zone with a shop
-Smithing now works 100%
-Teleblock now works perfectly can’t logout to cancel it
-Teleother now works perfectly
-Teleport Tablets now work perfectly with proper emotes, animations and GFX
-All PvP armors with perfect ints added
-Barrelchest anchor is 100%
-Void has proper bonuses when complete set is on
-EVERY knife now works properly
-Every god sword has proper GFX and effect
-Sara Sword now has perfect GFX
-General Graardor is 100% animated
-New assault interfaces work
-New Pest control interfaces work
-New hitmarks added
-100% vengeance with animations
-100% vengeance other with animations
-Barrows works properly with digging in tunnels
-EXP Lock and Unlocks added
-Crafting works with tanning and gem crafting
-New special bar with percent (%) of special left
-New HP bars
-New Textures added to client
-All combat following works
